scripts.start: cd main-site && pnpm install && npx docusaurus start
scripts.new: cd main-site && pnpm install && pnpm run new
scripts.dev:main: cd main-site && pnpm install && npx docusaurus start
scripts.dev:git: cd gitroad101 && pnpm install && npx vitepress dev .
scripts.clear:main: cd main-site && pnpm install && pnpm clear
scripts.clear:git: cd gitroad101 && pnpm install && pnpm clear
scripts.build:main: cd main-site && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.build:git: cd gitroad101 && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.build: pnpm run build:git && pnpm install && node scripts/integrate.js && pnpm run build:main
scripts.preview:main: cd main-site && pnpm install && pnpm run preview
scripts.preview:git: cd gitroad101 && pnpm install && pnpm run preview
